class elution_profile.ElutionProfile
fit_skew_normal(data_x, data_y, param_init=[None], param_bounds=[None])

startPrevFit

get_x_at_max_y()

Returns the x value for the peak of the elution profile COULD EXIST A MATHEMATICAL SOLUTION

get_x_range_for_y(Y)

Return the estimation of x values for y = constante

get_y(x)

for x return the estimated y value given the fitted function uses estimated parameters if fitted parameters are not determined

get_y_range_central_auc(auc_percent=99)

get the range on the y axis were the auc representing auc_percent of the total auc

get_y_serie(x_values, method='best')

for a list of x values return the estimated y values given the fitted function use estimated parameters if fitted parameters are not determined or is method = best
